name: Adam Wolfe: Dark Detective Mystery Game
name_original: Adam Wolfe: Dark Detective Mystery Game
description:
We’re an award-winning development studio founded in 2011 by a group of experienced developers and friends, passionate about making games. Known for hit casual games, we pushed the boundaries and set new standards in hidden-object adventures. With Adam Wolfe, we’re going a step further, bringing a mature narrative and innovative storytelling to the genre!

Be our fan on Facebook: www.facebook.com/madheadgames/

Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/madheadgames

Visit us: www.madheadgames.com
developers: Mad Head Games d.o.o. Novi Sad
publishers: Mad Head Games d.o.o. Novi Sad
